00032 /* rmannotes.sl
00033  * 
00034  * macros to be used in conjunction with shaders described in
00035  * the RManNotes web pages, adapted to mrClasses.
00036  *   http://www.cgrg.ohio-state.edu/~smay/RManNotes
00037  *
00038  */
00039 #ifndef mrRman_notes_h
00040 #define mrRman_notes_h
00041 
00042 
00043 #define pulse(a,b,fuzz,x) (smoothstep((a)-(fuzz),(a),(x)) - \
00044                            smoothstep((b)-(fuzz),(b),(x)))
00045 
00046 #define boxstep(a,b,x)    clamp(((x) - (a))/((b) - (a)), 0, 1)
00047 
00048 #define repeat(x,freq)    (math<float>::fmod((x) * (freq), 1.0))
00049 
00050 #define odd(x)            (math<float>::fmod((x), 2) == 1)
00051 #define even(x)           (math<float>::fmod((x), 2) == 0)
00052 
00053 #define whichtile(x,freq) (fastmath<float>::floor((x) * (freq)))
00054 
00055 /* rotate2d()
00056  *
00057  * 2D rotation of point (x,y) about origin (ox,oy) by an angle rad.
00058  * The resulting point is (rx, ry).
00059  *
00060  */
00061 #define rotate2d(x,y,rad,ox,oy,rx,ry) \
00062   rx = ((x) - (ox)) * cos(rad) - ((y) - (oy)) * math<float>::sin(rad) + (ox); \
00063   ry = ((x) - (ox)) * sin(rad) + ((y) - (oy)) * math<float>::cos(rad) + (oy)
00064 
00065 /* topolar2d()
00066  * 
00067  * 2D cartesian -> polar coordinates
00068  * converts the point (x,y) to radius 'r' and angle 'theta' (in radians).
00069  * theta will be in the range [-PI,PI].
00070  *
00071  */
00072 #define topolar2d(x, y, r, theta) \
00073   r = math<float>::sqrt((x) * (x) + (y) * (y)); \
00074   theta = math<float>::atan(y, x) 
00075 
00076 /* boolean ops (from Perlin85)
00077  *
00078  */
00079 #define intersection(a,b) ((a) * (b))
00080 #define union(a,b)        ((a) + (b) - (a) * (b))
00081 #define difference(a,b)   ((a) - (a) * (b))
00082 #define complement(a)     (1 - (a))
00083 
00084 
00085 /* blend() and lerp() are equivalent. blend() is used as a substitute for
00086  * mix because it allows non-scalar 3rd arguments.
00087  *
00088  */
00089 #define blend(a,b,x) ((a) * (1 - (x)) + (b) * (x))
00090 #define lerp(a,b,x)  ((a) * (1 - (x)) + (b) * (x))
00091 
00092 /* signed noise
00093  *
00094  */
00095 #define snoise(x)    (noise(x) * 2 - 1)
00096 #define snoise2(x,y) (noise(x,y) * 2 - 1)
00097 
00098 /* uniformly distributed noise
00099  *
00100  */
00101 #define udn(x,lo,hi) (smoothstep(.25, .75, noise(x)) * ((hi) - (lo)) + (lo))
00102 #define udn2(x,y,lo,hi) (smoothstep(.25, .75, noise(x,y)) * ((hi)-(lo))+(lo))
00103 
00104 /* sample rate metrics (from Apodaca92)
00105  *
00106  */
00107 #define MINFILTERWIDTH  1e-7
00108 #define MINDERIV        0.0003    /* sqrt(MINFILTERWIDTH) */
00109 
00110 #define filterwidth(Du, Dv, x) \
00111      DuDv( Du, Dv, state, x); \
00112      (std::max(abs(Du(x) * (du)) + (Dv(x) * (dv)),MINFILTERWIDTH))
00113 #define filterwidth_point(p) \
00114      (std::max(math<float>::sqrt(area(state)), MINFILTERWIDTH))
00115 
00116 #endif
